title: I'm so glad that balance team focus on buffing Fiora more than Buffing and fixing Yorick

https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/yorick/platinum

stop being some "elitist jerk"
 does diamond+ matter? yes it does...

 but it doesn't matter MORE than 98% of the playerbase

 if a champion is going to be balanced it has to be balanced within a range where it is useable for the most people

 you cant have a champion balance in bronze and have it being 42% for people in high elo.. just like u cant have it be balance in high elo and have it be at a 56% winrate in low elo... u need to split the difference.. and the larger the winrate differential between elos the more difference there is going to be..

 right now {{champion:83}} is balanced for 98% of the players... for every player plat and below yorik is a strong pick.. and in diamond + he could probably use buffs yeah.. but those same buffs would break him for the other 98%... so u cant do that.

 just like you cant make a champions have a 46-47% winrate in every elo just to keep their "high elo" winrate at 50%

 what you would do is you would make it so the high elo plat +  winrate goes from say 50% to 52-53%

 and the low elo ranges (bronze - gold) from 49-51%.. 

 what you are asking for  is to bring yorik into a 50% winrate in diamond + when by doing that would completely break him for the other 98% of players.

and doing so  is just you being a selfish person who wants a champion u play buffed. rather that thinking of whats good for the game and the actual balance of said champion.

i have wanted nidalee buffed for years... but may or may not have noticed that after she hit 48% winrate in my elo... i STOPPED asking for buffs... because i KNEW thats she had a 52% winrate in hgher elo... and that nidalee has a large winrate differential... so any buffs that would help me.. would break her higher  up... 

 did i still want the buffs? yeah.. but i knew that GIVING them to her at that point would have been a mistake being doing so would break her in a differen't elo.
even if they would improve her in mine.

 now that nidalee is below 50% in every elo.. i feel perfectly fine about asking for buffs to her again... because NOW a flat 2% winrate.. even if added in every elo.. isnt going to break her anywhere..

 you on the other hand, are IGNORING this; and are asking for a buff to a champion that if done would 100% break them for well over 90% of players.

and YOU dont care. you only want this buff your YOURSELF and don't care how it would affect others
